console.message: User {user} asked Magnus to perform the action "{action}", without an associated handler

UNKNOWN_COMMAND.discord: I'm sorry, I'm not familiar with the "{action}" command...

console.message: Something went horribly wrong in the handler for {command}, like is there something undefined in there or misspelled?? Argument Dump: {args}

FAILURE_COMMAND.discord: I'm sorry, I could not process that command...

console.message: User {user} asked Magnus to perform the action "{action}" successfully
Magnus booting up and logging into Discord
User {user} asked Magnus to perform the action "{action}" while in an unacceptable channel: "{channel}"

NONPUBLIC_CHANNEL.discord: I'm sorry, you must make this command in a public channel. Unfortunately, "{channel}" doesn't count.

console.message: User {user} asked Magnus to perform the action "{action}" while not in a voice channel

NON_VOICE_CHANNEL.discord: I'm sorry, you must join a voice channel before I can start dropping chill beats in it!

console.message: Magnus was unable to join the voice channel "{voiceChannel}"

UNABLE_TO_CONNECT.discord: I'm sorry, I wasn't able to join the voice channel... maybe try again in a bit?
